android.permission.INTERNET.description: Allows an application to create network sockets.

android.permission.WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAG.description: Allows an application to write to the SD card.

android.permission.ACCESS_NETWORK_STATE.description: Allows an application to view the status of all networks.

android.permission.VIBRATE.description: Allows the application to control the vibrator.

android.permission.WAKE_LOCK.description: Allows an application to prevent the phone from going to sleep.

com.google.android.c2dm.permission.RECEI.description: Permission for cloud to device messaging.

manifest_analysis.title:
Application Data can be Backed up
[android:allowBackup=true]
manifest_analysis.desc: This flag allows anyone to backup your application data via adb. It allows users who have enabled USB debugging to copy application data off of the device.

manifest_analysis.desc: A Broadcast Receiver is found to be shared with other apps on the device therefore leaving it accessible to any other application on the device. It is protected by a permission which is not defined in the analysed application. As a result, the protection level of the permission should be checked where it is defined. If it is set to signature, only applications signed with the same certificate can obtain the permission.

playstore_details.title: Puppy Newborn Baby
playstore_details.description:
Hello!! help us to our puppy pet newborn baby. It's too much exciting!! New born baby is coming. Mom and the new born both needs your love and care. It's all about the journey to become a mom. No one can love like a mom do. Just help her to decorate new born baby's room. 

Give the mom better treatment and welcome her new born puppy. You have to do care of newborn because he needs extra care. Baby wants to play so play with him. Enjoy this fantastic Puppy Newborn Baby game.


Features

Mom wants to sleep, but the room is too dirty. Please help her to clean the room.
Mom wants to go clinic for routine check-up so take her to the hospital.
Hey! help her to decorate baby's room with so many tools.
welcome her new born puppy and care.
Dress up your puppy with different style of dresses.
Puppy pet play with so many toys.
playstore_details.summary: Puppy newborn baby is caring game. Mom and Baby pet daycare.
playstore_details.summaryHTML: Puppy newborn baby is caring game. Mom and Baby pet daycare.
